title: Right Tool For The Job
blocka: A: Solo Survival: 1. On success +2 fortune.
blockb: B: Solo Survival: 2. On success may add +2 dice to all survival tests for the remainder of the season. Burn card and unlock Keel 2.

title: Alone in the Dark
blocka: Infiltration Mission: Solo Thievery: 1. On success may add +2 dice to all thievery tests for the remainder of the season. Burn card and unlock Keel 3.
blockb: Else: Solo Thievery: 2. On success gain 2 fortune.

title: The Direct Approach
blocka: A: +4 fortune and every other character in group is angry. Burn card and unlock Menas 2.

title: Whispering Spirits
blocka: Oniri is in group: Menas is weary. Burn card and unlock Menas 3.
blockb: Else: Solo Combat: 2. On success +2 fortune.

title: Black and White
blocka: A: Solo Rapport: 1. On success remove angry condition on another character.
blockb: B: Solo Rapport 2. On success remove shaken condition on another character. Burn card and unlock Thea 2.

title: The Conciliator
blocka: A: Solo Command: 2. Thea is weary and may remove one psyche condition on another character. Burn card and unlock Thea 3.
blockb: B: Solo Command: 2. On success +1 diplomacy.

title: Market Manipulations
blocka: (If Thea Is In Group) A: Fuscus returns to Red Bank. Burn card and unlock Fuscus 2.

title: Bending Rules
blocka: Infiltration Mission: Solo Rapport: 2. On success may return a timer card back into the deck. Burn card and unlock Fuscus 3.
blockb: Else: Solo Rapport: 2. On success +1 luxury.

title: I'm Always in Pain
blocka: A: May give Oniri a condition to remove a condition from someone else in the group. Burn card and unlock Oniri 2.
blockb: B: Solo Lore 1. On success +1 mana.

title: Always Alone
blocka: Oniri is alone: Burn card and unlock Oniri 3.
blockb: Else: Solo Lore 2. On success +2 mana.

title: TBD
blockb: Solo Lore: 1. On success heal one condition on any character in group.
